result.purpose: Responsible for interacting with a blockchain node to retrieve block information.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to blockchain interactions in a dedicated package.

internal/infras/getblock/client.go.purpose: Provides a client for executing RPC calls to a blockchain node.

internal/infras/getblock/models.go.purpose: Defines models for the getblock package.
